docs.snippet: A wide-ranging civil rights investigation into the Cleveland police is the latest in a series of federal interventions in police departments across the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: A wide-ranging civil rights investigation into the Cleveland police is the latest in a series of federal interventions in police departments across the United States.
docs.abstract: Cleveland is latest city where Justice Dept has opened a wide-ranging civil rights investigation into police conduct.

headline.main: As Justice Department Scrutinizes Local Police, Cleveland Is Latest Focus
headline.print_headline: As Justice Department Scrutinizes Local Police, Cleveland Is Latest Focus

byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson contributed reporting from New Orleans.

docs.snippet: For residents of the Kochs’ hometown, Wichita, Kan., the brothers are known less for their political agenda and more for their extensive philanthropy, which some see as a mixed blessing....
docs.lead_paragraph: For residents of the Kochs’ hometown, Wichita, Kan., the brothers are known less for their political agenda and more for their extensive philanthropy, which some see as a mixed blessing.
docs.abstract: Influence of billionaire brothers Charles and David Koch is both revered and reviled in their hometown Wichita, Kan; their extensive philanthropy has dazzled some residents, while others see Koch activities as insidious, an attempt to buy good will while the staunch conservatives and their political allies work to dismantle bedrock government programs important to average Kansans.

headline.main: In Wichita, Koch Influence Is Revered and Reviled
headline.print_headline: In Wichita, Koch Influence Is Revered and Reviled
